General.Name: Commcenter S.A.
General.Description: Commcenter, S.A. provides voice and data solutions for companies, professionals, and individuals in Spain. The company offers fixed connectivity products, such as individual lines, ISDN and ADSL products, voice posts, computer stations, integral positions, telephones and switchboards, and network connections. It also provides mobile connectivity products that include mobile phones and accessories. In addition, the company offers services, such as LAN and PC maintenance, antivirius and firewall pack, and ADSL maintenance services. Commcenter, S.A. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in A Coruña, Spain.
General.Address: Avda. Do Ferrocarril, A Coruña, Spain, 15008
